title: Janey's First Act
description: Janey Wong is just eighteen years old, but she knows what she wants to do with her life—she dreams of being an actor. Pursuing this dream can be hard: she knows that she may not succeed; her parents are hesitant and afraid, and her boyfriend can’t relate to her passion. When technology offers an interesting opportunity, Janey considers an alternate life.This is a coming-of-age science fiction story about young adults and the big decisions they must make, a story about ambition, honesty, technology, and growing up.
author: C.C. Alma
